name: Jamie Oliver
bio: Jamie Oliver is a celebrity chef known for his fresh, simple cuisine and his campaign to improve food education in schools.

name: Emeril Lagasse
bio: Emeril Lagasse is a celebrity chef known for his New Orleans-style cuisine and irrepressible personality. He has hosted several television shows and written numerous cookbooks.

famous_recipes.name: Crab Cakes
ingredients: 1/2 cup canned claw crab meat, drained
